Linovus is a team of IT Professionals. Our team is based out of Toronto, Canada with servers spread throughout the US and Canada. We are dedicated to your needs and will be here for you 24/7 for any of your needs.

Linovus Holdings Inc has been in business supporting clients since 2014 and we're proud to present Linovus.hosting as our web hosting services shopfront.

To celebrate this and share how excited we are, come and experience our quality performance VPS' with a whopping 60% RECURRING DISCOUNT!

GET OUR LEVEL 1 VPS FOR ONLY $11.40 USD / $15.00 CAD ANNUALLY!

Xeon 5420 to E5-2670v2
- 32GB Ram to 128GB Ram
- RAID 10 Hard drives
- 1Gbit Port
Located in Atlanta, GA.

These offers are only available if you sign up before 27th September 2016, so grab the deal whilst you can!
